summary:
Experience highlights:

Localizing and managing marketing communications texts (e-communications, web content, brochures, guides) in a variety of languages with specialization in the Russian language. Close cooperation with in-house reviewers in commercial and technical fields. 
Creation, editing and maintenance of translation memory software (Across Systems) as well as training and introduction of the new co-workers to the work environment.
Experience with several marketing communication tasks and responsibilities, including project management.

Specialties: marketing communications / translations / sales and support / teaching and writing skills.

You may find me an open and accessible person: coachable, willing to learn new skills and motivated to grow in different careers and fields. Experience in working with various (international) personalities. Fluent in English, Dutch and Russian.
